column4: GRRR I wanna install the Star Office 8 Beta but, its a script based install, that calls rpms????
how, the script calls rpms not debs and its over 20 packages
what do you mean, there is only one installer its a script that launches a gui, then the gui tells you its going to install like 20 packages, then it fails cause there all RPM's
i have before way back at 5.2
this is different the installer is different
sun dont make a debian package
I have been trying to tell you, ITS NOT AN RPM its a script based installer (.sh) its just calling RPM's during the install
how can i refresh the server list?
